hash-base

Abstract base class to inherit from if you want to create streams implementing the same API as node crypto Hash (for Cipher / Decipher check crypto-browserify/cipher-base).

Example

```js function MyHash () { HashBase.call(64) // in bytes }

inherti(MyHash, HashBase)

MyHash.prototype._update = function () { // hashing one block with buffer this._block }

MyHash.prototype._digest = function () { // create padding and produce result } ``` You also can check source code or crypto-browserify/md5.js
